description: This file defines a RecyclerView Adapter for displaying recommended restaurants in a food delivery app's UI. It manages the list items, binds restaurant data to views, and handles item click events.

classes.name: RecommendedRestaurantAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for displaying a list of recommended restaurants, handles view creation and data binding.

classes.name: RecommendedRestaurantAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class holding references to the views for each restaurant item.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: Object implementing DiffUtil.ItemCallback to optimize list updates.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item view and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds restaurant data to the ViewHolder views and sets click listener.
